mapper.select: SELECT RVW_ID , RVW_CNTNT , RVW_DT , SCR , IS_DLT , DLT_DT , EMIL_ADDR , PJ_ID , RVW_RPRT_CNT FROM PJ_RVW WHERE PJ_ID = #{_parameter} AND IS_DLT = 0

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PJ_RVW ( RVW_ID , RVW_CNTNT , RVW_DT , SCR , IS_DLT , EMIL_ADDR , PJ_ID ) VALUES (PJ_RVW_PK_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{rvwCntnt} , SYSDATE , #{scr} , 0 , #{emilAddr} , #{pjId} )
mapper.delete: UPDATE PJ_RVW SET IS_DLT = 1 , DLT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE RVW_ID = #{rvwId}
mapper.select: SELECT pi.PJ_ID , pr.RVW_ID , pr.RVW_CNTNT , pr.RVW_DT , pr.SCR , pr.IS_DLT , pr.EMIL_ADDR FROM PJ_RVW pr INNER JOIN PJ_INFO pi ON pr.EMIL_ADDR = pi.ORDR_ID AND pi.PJ_ID = pr.PJ_ID INNER JOIN MBR_INFO mi ON mi.EMIL_ADDR = pi.OBTN_ID WHERE mi.EMIL_ADDR IN (SELECT EMIL_ADDR FROM MBR_INFO WHERE CMP_ID = #{_parameter}) AND pr.IS_DLT = 0 ORDER BY pr.SCR DESC , pr.RVW_DT DESC
